Package it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.requests

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompletableChoice<T extends Serializable>
    Represents the "promise" of a value in response to a ChoiceRequest highly inspired by CompletableFuture.
    RequestManager
    Responsible for managing the ChoiceRequest sent to the view and for providing a way for their responses to complete the choices.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidChoiceException
    Thrown when an invalid choice is provided in response to a request
